notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was funded in part by the project (2020/2205), Grant Agency of Excellence, University of Hradec Kralove, Faculty of Informatics and Management, Czech Republic; project at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM) under Research University Grant Vot-20H04, Malaysia Research University Network (MRUN) Vot 4L876 and the Fundamental Research Grant Scheme (FRGS) Vot5F073, supported under Ministry of Education Malaysia for the completion of the research.
